Articles.Content:
Link? My fu seems to be totally failing me. It's not on the KSP youtube page nor does it show up in searches.

I'm also hunting videos. So hyped right now! My brain is full of ideas. Gotta remember to do an R-7, I've picked up like 3 ideas already for one that will look awesome I think. Anyhow, there should be a playlist somewhere...

Rune. Can't wait!
Excuse the noobish questuion, but, what's an R-7?

Can't wait to start a new career mode!!

Hype!

Excuse the noobish questuion, but, what's an R-7?

A rocket family, of which the Soyuz lifter is the latest generation. link

Guys.......1.0.......is in mere hours......

HOURS PEOPLE!!!!

Who's confident we could reach 200 pages by tomorrow?

Hype on!
I don't think we'll get to 200 pages but this hype train is second in relation to previous hype trains
Scott Manley is on in four hours. N1tch just started, then Das, then Scott.
highest hype train pages are at 0.24 with 298 pages

Oh hey, the goo canister got scaled down because otherwise it wouldn't fit in the small utility bay, word of RoverDude.

Actually glad they got scaled down, they were incredibly bulky before.

Edited April 26, 2015 by smjjames

Scott Manley is on in four hours. N1tch just started, then Das, then Scott.

* heavy breathing

EDIT: did they bring back the barn? It doesn't look like it.

Edited April 26, 2015 by SelectHalfling0

The wait is killing me. I haven't even played KSP in months but I had to come back for the release. I haven't even got a clue what to expect so this could be pretty exciting. For instance, since this is now the release build does that mean the second gas giant that Eeloo was planned to orbit is now in? Are there going to be new planets or moons at all? So many questions.

The wait is killing me. I haven't even played KSP in months but I had to come back for the release. I haven't even got a clue what to expect so this could be pretty exciting. For instance, since this is now the release build does that mean the second gas giant that Eeloo was planned to orbit is now in? Are there going to be new planets or moons at all? So many questions.

No second gas giant yet.
More SteamDB updates.
I'm back to load ze coal.
We need more hype!

Have some hype!
That's a lot of hypecoal.

More SteamDB updates.

Are they going to do those until the last minute? Them speeding up the DB updates doesn't make it look like it's ready, on the surface of it anyway.

New tech tree!

New aero!

New wings!

New heat-induced explosions!

Resources!

We've got to get to Plaid Factor 6!

Happy landings!

Have some hype!

Nice work fellas, HYPE has increased!!
I did request a wall of text trimmer, lol....

hype hype

hype hype

hype hype

There we go, neatly trimmed wall.
